default.value: POST /api/calculate - Required: loanAmount(1000-10M), interestRate(0.01-50%), termMonths(1-480). Optional: financeCharges, annualInsurance, propertyTaxes, mortgageInsurance. Returns: monthlyPITI, apr, totalPayments, amortizationSchedule
React+TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, React Hook Form, Zod validation, mobile-first responsive, WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility, <2s load time
Monthly Payment: M = P[r(1+r)^n]/[(1+r)^n-1], APR includes finance charges, PITI = Principal+Interest+Insurance+Taxes, Amortization schedule with monthly breakdown
React frontend completed with responsive design, form validation, API integration, amortization table, and error handling. Ready for backend integration on port 3000.

Frontend expects backend API on localhost:8000 with endpoints: POST /api/mortgage/calculate (principal, annualRate, years) -> {monthlyPayment}, POST /api/mortgage/amortization -> [{paymentNumber, monthlyPayment, principalPayment, interestPayment, remainingBalance}]
